edu.cmu.pslc.logging

Class AbstractMessageLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.pslc.logging.AbstractMessageLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageLogger
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileLogger, OliDatabaseLogger, OliDiskLogger

    public abstract class AbstractMessageLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageLogger
    The abstract class for the message loggers.
    Version:
    $Revision: 12489 $
    Last modified by: $Author: ctipper $
    Last modified on: $Date: 2015-08-05 13:05:34 -0400 (Wed, 05 Aug 2015) $
    Author:
    Alida Skogsholm
